results.content: The second part was good, and interesting, but the first (and sadly the bigger) part of the course is not about functional php programming.

results.content:
Did not enjoy or benefit from this course, it felt like a Frankenstein of other courses/videos which have been poorly edited together.

I feels like it's meant to accompany a book or something, which leaves the actual video content poorly explained and rushed.
